CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Term_Transfer_Stopped__c )) , "Term/Transfer Stopped"&BR()& ( IF( Flag_Notes_as_Important__c ==True, "See Termination Milestone Notes"&BR(), "") ) ,
( IF( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy__c , "Yes") && ISBLANK( Discrepancy_Closed_Date__c ) , "Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy"&BR(), "") & IF( Effective_Date_of_FSA_Termination__c > Today(), "Future FSA Last Check Date "&BR(), "") & IF( Effective_Date_of_HRA_Termination__c > Today(), "Future HRA Last Check Date "&BR(), "") & IF( Effective_Date_of_HSA_Termination__c > Today(), "Future HSA Last Check Date "&BR(), "") &
IF(AND((ISPICKVAL( POP_Downgrade__c , "Yes - POP Downgrade")||ISPICKVAL (POP_Downgrade__c, "Yes - POP Billing Needed")), ISNULL( POP_Downgrade_Complete__c ))&&(ISPICKVAL(FSA_Termination__c, "No")||(ISPICKVAL( FSA_Termination__c , "Yes")&& NOT(ISNULL(FSA_Bill_End_date__c))&&NOT(ISNULL( FSA_Cancel_Date_Entered__c))))&&(ISPICKVAL(HRA_Termination__c, "No")||(ISPICKVAL( HRA_Termination__c , "Yes")&& NOT(ISNULL(HRA_Bill_End_Date__c))&&NOT(ISNULL( HRA_Cancel_Date_Entered__c))))&& (ISPICKVAL(HSA_Termination__c, "No")||(ISPICKVAL( HSA_Termination__c , "Yes")&&NOT(ISNULL(HSA_Bill_End_Date__c))&&NOT(ISNULL( HSA_Cancel_Date_Entered__c)))), "Pending POP Setup"&BR(), "") &
IF( Flag_Notes_as_Important__c ==True, "See Termination Milestone Notes"&BR(), "") ) )
CustomField.label: Pending FSA Tasks
